title: Firefox for Android 42.0.1 Release

notes.note:
42.0.1 - Fix a crash in the OpenGL init process ([1209612][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1209612

42.0.1 - Android 6.0 devices (eg Nexus 5X/6P) reboot/restart or hang when playing audio/video fixed ([1221228][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1221228

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
